scripts.prepdocker:nextday: cp apps/nextday-delivery/target/*.jar build/nextday && cp -r apps/nextday-delivery/src/main/docker/* build/nextday && cp apps/nextday-delivery/src/main/resources/*.* build/nextday/config/ && cp data/seoul.distcache build/nextday/cache-res9.distcache
scripts.build: yarn builddir:reset && yarn mvn:package && yarn prepdocker:nextday
